name: The Fallen Holy Knight
description:
The Fallen Holy Knight

Submisi Individual Game Jam Kelas GameDev 2021/2022
Lazuardi Pratama Putra Nusantara - 1906398225

Synopsis

The holy knight, Leon, has fallen to the underworld in exchange for saving his allies from demon army. The underworld has a very poisonous air that even Leon, one of the best holy knights in his kingdom, find it very hard to breath. Most of his abilities are sealed because this environment. In order to go back to the overworld, his kingdom to be exact, he must fight through the underworld's residents, such as skeletons. Fortunately for him, the more he fights, the easier for him to adjust to the underworld's environment. He even manage to use an ability he didn't know he had up until now. Leon's desire to go back to the overworld become stronger because of this.

Description

The Fallen Holy Knight is a 2D's platformer action game. Throughtout the game, the holy knight Leon will be infected with poison and his health will depleted overtime if the poison bar is full. Help Leon return to his kingdom by killing all the underworld's skeletons that blocking his way!

Diversifier
  • Fine Motion (Character has a hidden ability he didn't know he had not until half of the game)
    You can use a new skill when you reach the second level.
  • Ave Maria (Character doesn't get effected by environment for a period of time)
    You can heal your self for a period of time
  • Nginep Santai (Character can craft a safe spot)
    You can enter a special state. While in this state, health will be restored instantly and the enemies can't inflict damage on you.
Control
  • Right and Left Arrow Key: Move to right or left
  • Space: Jump
  • Z: Attack
  • C: Heal for a period of time
  • V: Instant heal dan immune to enemy damage
